name: Kill the bird
description:
Submission for the Home of Nerds Game Jam. Discord name: Ardoos

Controls: To move character use arrows or wsad (Up arrow/W is available only if you have jetpack). Press Space to shoot.

Kill birds and destroy bombs to earn money, but don't let them touch you. Collect rockets to fly up, feathers to be lighter. Stay in storm clouds to grow.

After you die go to shop to be stronger than ever!
